price: 18. Waxay odhan: “Xurmo oo dhan Adigaa (Allow) iska leh oo ka hufan (xumaan)! Naguma habboona inaan yeelanno awliyo (gargaarayaal) Adiga ka sokow, waxaadse u raaxeysay iyaga iyo aabbayaashood ilaa ay halmaameen waanada, waxayna ahaayeen qolo ba'ay.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنۢبَغِي لَنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ وَلَٰكِن مَّتَّعۡتَهُمۡ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَسُواْ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمَۢا بُورٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka mā kāna yanbaghī lanā an nattakhidha min dūnika min awliyāa walākin mattaʿtahum waābāahum ḥattā nasū al-dhik'ra wakānū qawman būran
